General.Name: Ten Ren Tea Co Ltd
General.Description: Ten Ren Tea Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of tea, tea sets, and beverages in Taiwan and internationally. The company also provides catering services. It offers its products under the Ten Ren Tea Culture Museum, Ten Ren Tea, CHAFFEE, Ten Ren Tea Fun ToGo, and Tian Ren Tea Fun brands. Ten Ren Tea Co., Ltd. was founded in 1953 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 107, Zhongxiao East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 106

1.Name: Mr. Chung-Chih  Chen
1.Title: CFO, VP of Fin. & Admin. Group and Chief Corp. Governance Officer
